alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 4:58PM EDT until May 21 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Ashtabula County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 458 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Orwell, or 15 miles southeast of Geneva-On-The-Lake, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Andover, Roaming Shores, Pierpont, Cherry Valley and Rock Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
